name: Circle of the Blighted
description: Druids corrupted by tainted lands who wield decay as a weapon.

2.name: Defile Ground
2.description: As a bonus action, corrupt a 10-foot radius area for 1 minute, creating difficult terrain that deals extra necrotic damage once per turn.

2.name: Blighted Shape
2.description: Gain Intimidation proficiency and while Wild Shaped your form gains +2 AC and 60-foot darkvision.

6.name: Call of the Shadowseeds
6.description: When a creature takes damage in your defiled ground, summon a blighted sapling that can immediately attack.

10.name: Defile Ground (10th Level)
10.description: Your defiled area expands to a 20-foot radius and the extra damage increases to 1d6.

10.name: Foul Conjuration
10.description: Creatures you summon are immune to necrotic and poison damage and explode with necrotic damage when they die.

14.name: Defile Ground (14th Level)
14.description: The extra damage from your defiled ground increases to 1d8.

14.name: Incarnation of Corruption
14.description: Gain resistance to necrotic damage, +2 AC, and can gain temporary hit points when starting your turn in your defiled ground.

choices.name: Circle of the Blighted Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Circle of the Blighted subclass
